attributes.action: Reward Eric Schmitt-Matzen (USA) an honourary Knighthood for his work as Santa
attributes.background:
Eric Schmitt-Matzen, who plays Father Christmas has given a heartbreaking account of how a five-year-old boy died in his arms.

Read more: http://metro.co.uk/2016/12/12/terminally-ill-boy-5-dies-in-santas-arms-as-he-fulfills-final-wish-to-see-him-6317140/#ixzz4Skc4xpI2

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
